data.name: Soft relooking
data.description:
You provide relooking services for your customers. One day, you receive a call from your vip customer, John Putin, about an urgent relooking.

Another professional gave him advices on how to dress, depending on his own experience in mode industry.

John Putin is dressed like a string looking like a multidimensional object. 

Your job is to transform the string appearance of John Putin into a beautiful multidimensional array IF POSSIBLE.

  Example
  ```
    let johnPutin = "{{'relook'},{'me'},{'please','relook','me'}}";
  ```
  
And after the relooking, John Putin should look like
  Example
  ```
    return johnPutin = [["relook"],["me"],["please","relook","me"]];
  ```
  
If John Putin can not be relooked, kindly deny the job by returning false.
